name: Roof Runner (KucherovCZ)
description:
Simple platformer 2D game, made by two people with no experience in Unity.
Your jumping on roofs trying to get the most score.
(Becomes nearly impossible at 2000 score)

All assets are made by us except music:

MainMenu: https://youtu.be/uFZ35E6qYvw
InGame: https://youtu.be/HUCjaaQR6cs
